images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of winter Istanbul, showcasing snowy streets and cozy cafes.
AI-selected This destination image will highlight the beauty and charm of Istanbul in winter, featuring landmarks under snow to evoke a serene atmosphere.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and promotions related to winter travel to Istanbul.

AI-selected The brand logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trust in the promotional campaign.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of winter in Istanbul
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting a snowy Istanbul with empty streets, cozy cafes, and winter activities

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Istanbul during winter
assetRequirements.content_context: highlighting cultural landmarks in a winter setting

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Зимний Стамбул ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of winter Istanbul, showcasing snowy streets and cozy cafes.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
